author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SymBio Pharmaceuticals says termination of development of patient-controlled pain management drug SyB P-1501
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - SymBio Pharmaceuticals Ltd
* Says it terminates the development of “IONSYS” or “SyB P-1501” in Japan, a drug for patient-controlled, short-term management of acute postoperative pain during hospitalization
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/ikDcFw
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
